GV05kaivup_u:0: [Oṃ bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devāḥ bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhir yajatrāḥ |
GV05kaivup_u:1: sthirair aṅgais tuṣṭuvāṃsas tanūbhir vyaśema devahitaṃ yadāyuḥ |
GV05kaivup_u:2: svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ |
GV05kaivup_u:3: svasti nas tārkṣyo 'riṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatir dadhātu |
GV05kaivup_u:6: adhīhi bhagavan brahmavidyāṃ variṣṭhāṃ sadā sadbhiḥ sevyamānāṃ nigūḍhām |
GV05kaivup_u:7: yathācirāt [yayācirāt] sarvapāpaṃ vyapohya parātparaṃ puruṣaṃ yāti vidvān
GV05kaivup_u:8: tasmai sa hovāca pitāmahaś ca śraddhā-bhakti-dhyāna-yogād avaihi |
GV05kaivup_u:9: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaike amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ ||2||
GV05kaivup_u:10: pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyāṃ vibhrājate yad yatayo viśanti |
GV05kaivup_u:12: te brahmalokeṣu parāntakāle parāmṛtāḥ [parāmṛtāt] parimucyanti sarve |
GV05kaivup_u:14: antyāśramasthaḥ sakalendriyāṇi nirudhya bhaktyā svaguruṃ praṇamya |
GV05kaivup_u:15: hṛtpuṇḍarīkaṃ virajaṃ viśuddhaṃ vicintya madhye viṣadam [viśadaṃ] viśokam
GV05kaivup_u:16: acintyam avyaktam anantarūpaṃ śivaṃ praśāntam amṛtaṃ brahmayonim |
GV05kaivup_u:17: tam ādimadhyāntavihīnam ekaṃ vibhuṃ cidānandam arūpam adbhutam ||6||
GV05kaivup_u:18: umāsahāyaṃ parameśvaraṃ prabhuṃ trilocanaṃ nīlakaṇṭhaṃ praśāntam |
GV05kaivup_u:19: dhyātvā munirgacchati bhūtayoniṃ samastasākṣiṃ tamasaḥ parastāt ||7||
GV05kaivup_u:20: sa brahmā sa śivaḥ sendraḥ so 'kṣaraḥ paramaḥ svarāṭ |
GV05kaivup_u:21: sa eva viṣṇuḥ sa prāṇaḥ sa kālo 'gniḥ sa candramāḥ ||8||
GV05kaivup_u:22: sa eva sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhavyaṃ sanātanam |
GV05kaivup_u:23: jñātvā taṃ mṛtyum atyeti nānyaḥ panthā vimuktaye ||9||
GV05kaivup_u:25: saṃpaśyan brahma paramaṃ yāti nānyena hetunā ||10||
GV05kaivup_u:28: sa eva māyāparimohitātmā śarīram āsthāya karoti sarvam |
GV05kaivup_u:29: striyannapānādivicitrabhogaiḥ sa eva jāgrat paritṛptim eti ||12||
GV05kaivup_u:30: svapna [svapne] sa jīvaḥ sukhaduḥkhabhoktā svamāyayā kalpitajīvaloke |
GV05kaivup_u:31: suṣuptikāle sakale vilīne tamo 'bhibhūtaḥ sukharūpam eti ||13||
GV05kaivup_u:32: punaśca janmāntarakarmayogāt sa eva jīvaḥ svapiti prabuddhaḥ |
GV05kaivup_u:33: puratraye krīḍati yaśca jīvas tatas tu jātaṃ sakalaṃ vicitram ||14||
GV05kaivup_u:34: dhāramānandam akhaṇḍabodhaṃ yasmiṃl layaṃ yāti puratrayaṃ ca ||14*||
GV05kaivup_u:35: etasmāj jāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca |
GV05kaivup_u:36: khaṃ vāyur jyotir āpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī ||15||
GV05kaivup_u:37: yat paraṃ brahma sarvātmā viśvasyāyatanaṃ mahat |
GV05kaivup_u:38: sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nityaṃ tat tvam eva tvam eva tat ||16||
GV05kaivup_u:40: tad brahmāham iti jñātvā sarvabandhaiḥ pramucyate ||17||
GV05kaivup_u:41: triṣu dhāmasu yad bhogyaṃ bhoktā bhogaś ca yad bhavet |
GV05kaivup_u:42: tebhyo vilakṣaṇaḥ sākṣī cinmātro 'haṃ sadā śivaḥ ||18||
GV05kaivup_u:43: mayy eva sakalaṃ jātaṃ mayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam |
GV05kaivup_u:44: mayi sarvaṃl layaṃ yāti tad brahmādvayam asmy aham ||19||
GV05kaivup_u:46: aṇor aṇiyān aham eva tadvan mahān ahaṃ viśvam ahaṃ vicitram |
GV05kaivup_u:47: purātano 'haṃ puruṣo 'ham īśo hiraṇmayo 'haṃ śivarūpam asmi ||20||
GV05kaivup_u:48: apāṇipādo 'ham acintyaśaktiḥ paśyāmy acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇomy akarṇaḥ |
GV05kaivup_u:49: ahaṃ vijānāmi viviktarūpo na cāsti vettā mama cit sadāham ||21||
GV05kaivup_u:50: vedair anekair aham eva vedyo vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham |
GV05kaivup_u:51: na puṇyapāpe mama nāsti nāśo na janma dehendriyabuddhir asti ||22||
GV05kaivup_u:52: na bhūmir āpo na ca vahnir asti na cānilo me 'sti na cāmbaraṃ ca |
GV05kaivup_u:53: evaṃ viditvā paramātmarūpaṃ guhāśayaṃ niṣkalam advitīyam ||23||
GV05kaivup_u:55_0: yaḥ śatarūdrīyam adhīte so 'gnipūto bhavati sa vāyupūto bhavati, sa ātmapūto bhavati sa surāpānāt pūto bhavati sa brahmahatyātpūto
GV05kaivup_u:55_1: bhavati sa suvarṇasteyāt pūto bhavati sa kṛtyākṛtyāt pūto bhavati tasmād avimuktam
GV05kaivup_u:56: āśrito bhavaty āśramī sarvadā sakṛd vā japet |
GV05kaivup_u:58: tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ kaivalyaṃ padam [phalam] aśnute |
